to bind; to wrap; a bundle; a parcel
связывать; обернуть; набор; посылка
rtega_mnemonic:
裹裹RS䙨褁𦆪wrap, bind, encircle, confine
  • clothes 衣 to wrap fruit 果 in
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 果 indicates the sound; 衣 (clothes) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
包裹 [ bāo guǒ ]: to wrap up; to bind up; bundle; parcel; package; Classifiers: 个
裹挟 [ guǒ xié ]: to sweep along; to coerce
裹足不前 [ guǒ zú bù qián ]: to stand still without advancing (idiom); to hesitate and hold back
裹胁 [ guǒ xié ]: to compel; to coerce
紧裹 [ jǐn guǒ ]: to wrap tightly; to wind tightly; to bind; close-fitting (clothes)

heisig_chinese_memo: The banana man is just a piece of fruit who likes to envelop his body not only with his natural fruit skin case but also with a top hat and scarf.
Ru_trainchinese: guǒ: (глаг) заворачивать, обертывать; исчезать, пропадать вместе с
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the fruits (果) in your clothes (𧘇) under the lid (亠) are wrapped
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The banana man is just a piece of fruit who likes to envelop his body not only with his natural fruit skin case but also with a top hat and scarf.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " clothing " and " fruit ", the original meaning is entanglement. "Shuowen": "Twisting. From clothing, fruity sound." "Poetry‧Daya‧Gongliu": "Wrapped in rice grains, in the bag."

" Wrapped " can mean inclusion. "Huainanzi-Binglue Training": "The former Chu people landed in Yuanxiang in the south, Yingsi in the north, Bashu in the west, and Tanpi in the east."

" Wrap " also means a measurement word used as a package. "Mu Tianzi Biography" Volume 2: "Zhu Sanbaizuo, Wu is worshipped and received."

" Wrap " also means the ovary or fruit of flowers and plants. "Selected Works‧Song Yu "Gao Tang Fu"": "Green leaves wrapped in purple, vermilion stems and white pedicles." Li Shan's note: "Wrapped, like a house."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " clothing " and " fruit ", the original meaning is entanglement.
humanum_full_description:
從「衣」，「果」聲，本義為纏繞。《說文》：「纏也。从衣，果聲。」 《詩‧大雅‧公劉》：「迺裹餱糧，于橐于囊。」

　　「裹」可表示包羅。《淮南子‧兵略訓》：「昔者楚人地，南卷沅湘，北繞潁泗，西包巴蜀，東裹郯邳。」

　　「裹」也表示用作包裹之物的計量詞。《穆天子傳》卷二：「朱三百裹，兀乃膜拜而受。」

　　「裹」還表示花草的子房或果實。《文選‧宋玉〈高唐賦〉》：「綠葉紫裹，朱莖白蔕。」李善注：「裹，猶房也。」

從「 衣 」，「 果 」聲，本義為纏繞。《說文》：「纏也。从衣，果聲。」 《詩‧大雅‧公劉》：「迺裹餱糧，于橐于囊。」 「 裹 」可表示包羅。《淮南子‧兵略訓》：「昔者楚人地，南卷沅湘，北繞潁泗，西包巴蜀，東裹郯邳。」 「 裹 」也表示用作包裹之物的計量詞。《穆天子傳》卷二：「朱三百裹，兀乃膜拜而受。」 「 裹 」還表示花草的子房或果實。《文選‧宋玉〈高唐賦〉》：「綠葉紫裹，朱莖白蔕。」李善注：「裹，猶房也。」
From the sound of " clothing" and " fruit", the original meaning is entanglement. "Shuowen": "Twisting. From clothing, fruity sound." "Poetry‧Daya‧Gongliu": "Wrapped in rice grains, in the bag." " Wrapped" can mean inclusion. "Huainanzi-Binglue Training": "The former Chu people landed in Yuanxiang in the south, Yingsi in the north, Bashu in the west, and Tanpi in the east." " Wrap" also means a measurement word used as a package. "Mu Tianzi Biography" Volume 2: "Zhu Sanbaizuo, Wu is worshipped and received." " Wrap" also means the ovary or fruit of flowers and plants. "Selected Works‧Song Yu "Gao Tang Fu"": "Green leaves wrapped in purple, vermilion stems and white pedicles." Li Shan's note: "Wrapped, like a house."

裹字的基本解释

裹
guǒ
包；缠绕：裹脚。把这包糖裹好。裹足不前。
夹带；夹杂：不该把次货裹进去卖。好人坏人裹在一起一时分不清。
方言，吸（奶）：小孩生下来就会裹奶。奶头被这孩子裹得生疼。

裹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guǒ］
［《廣韻》古火切，上果，見。］
［《廣韻》古卧切，去過，見。］
亦作“褁1”。
(1)包扎；缠绕。
(2)引申为包。
(3)携带。
(4)停止。
(5)包罗；笼罩。
(6)穿上；着。
(7)果腹。
(8)袋；包。
(9)用作包裹之物的计量词。
(10)形状。
(11)花草的子房或果实。
(12)方言。吸。

裹字的英文翻译

◎ 裹
swathe, wrap

裹字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　裹； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1119第12
【唐韻】【韻會】?古火切，音果。【玉篇】包也。【詩·大雅】乃裹糇糧。【莊子·大宗師】裹飯而往食之。　又【宋玉·高唐賦】綠葉紫裹。【註】裹，猶房也。　又【郭璞·江賦】濯穎散裹。【註】裹，謂草實也。　又【說文】纏也。　又【集韻】古臥切，音過。義同。　又【韻會】指所包之物也。

裹字的源字形

裹字的起名意思

本义指包，缠。后也有携带等含义。

wrap
Basic explanation of words
wrap
guǒ
Package; winding: bound feet. Wrap the bag of sugar. Hesitated.
Entrainment; inclusion: inferior goods should not be wrapped in and sold. The good guys and the bad guys are lumped together for a while.
Dialect, sucking (milk): A child will be wrapped in milk when it is born. The baby's nipple hurts.
wrap

[①]［guǒ］
["Guangyun" ancient fire cut, fruit, see. ]
["Guangyun" ancient lying cut, have been there, see you. ]
Also known as "Coat 1".
(1) Bandaging; winding.
(2) Extended to package.
(3) Carry.
(4) Stop.
(5) Inclusive; shrouded.
(6) Put on; put on.
(7) Abdomen.
(8) Bag; bag.
(9) A measure word used as a package.
(10) Shape.
(11) The ovary or fruit of flowers and plants.
(12) Dialects. Suck.

guǒ
I гл.
1) завёртывать, обвёртывать; сворачивать (в пакет, узел)
裹而又缠 свернуть (завернуть) и туго завязать
把婴儿裹在襁褓里 запеленать ребёнка в пелёнки
2) перевязывать (рану), бинтовать
用绷带把伤口裹好 бинтом хорошенько забинтовать рану
3) впутывать, замешивать, примешивать
把次货裹在好货里卖 продавать плохие товары, смешав их с хорошими
4) сосать
裹奶 сосать грудь (о ребенке)
II сущ.
пакет, свёрток, узел
大包小裹 большие тюки, малые узлы
邮政包裹 почтовая посылка
